tourBios.curYrHigh: Posted rounds of 68-72-70-69 to finish at 279 (-5) and claim medalist honors at the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica Q-School in January. Finished five strokes clear of the field on a fast and firm golf course at Club Los Lagartos in Bogota, Colombia... Followed an opening 73 with rounds of 70-69-70 in windy conditions to finish T9 at the Lexus Panama Classic on his second start of the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica season in March.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015 Made the cut at the Web.com Tour's Chitimacha Louisina Open in March.

2014: Made the cut in two starts on the Web.com Tour… Finished solo sixth at the PGA TOUR Canada Q-School at Oak Valley GC to earn exempt status for the season… Missed the cut on his first three starts before calling it a season because of mononucleosis.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Twice named all-region and three times all-conference at the University of Indianapolis… Earned GCAA D-II PING All-American Honorable Mention as a sophomore... Had 13 career top-five finishes, including three individual titles... Named a D-II Cleveland Golf/Srixon All-America Scholar on his last year… Four-time all-conference and all-county honoree at Brownsburg HS.
tourBios.personal: Has two brothers, Nate and Drew… A big fan of the Indiana Hoosiers and the NFL's Indianapolis Colts… Earned three varsity letters in both football and basketball while at Brownsburg HS… Twitter/Instagram handles: @skeeterfair
